New Records: Buddy Hield has now made 23 3-points this season, breaking his own record for most made threes in the first five games with a new team in NBA history.
Key Match Events: Buddy Hield led the way with 21 points off the bench.
Brandin Podziemski finished with a near triple-double, recording 13 points, eight rebounds and seven assists.
Buddy Hield made a 26-foot buzzer beater to close the first half.
Draymond Green scored eight straight points for the Warriors in the second quarter, knocking down two 3-pointers during his run.
Draymond Green finished with a season-high 14 points, connecting on three 3-pointers and recording five blocks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lindy Waters III got his first career start as a Warrior and the second of his career, finishing with three points and three assists with a plus-13 plus-minus.
